alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Putnam; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 1:51AM EDT until May 20 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MASON...NORTH CENTRAL KANAWHA...NORTHEASTERN PUTNAM...WESTERN ROANE AND SOUTHERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 150 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kenna, or 10 miles south of Ripley, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Spencer, Kenna, Statts Mills, Harmony, Given, Kentuck, Liberty, Walton, Cottageville, Evans, Looneyville, Fairplain, Gay and Gandeeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
